answers.text: not against political organization or "governance"—so long as it is self-governance utilizing direct democracy.

qas.question: What mode of government does the anarchists prefer?
What mode of government does the anarchists hate?
What mode of sports does the anarchists prefer?

context: Anarchists are against the <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>State<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/> but are <a1_0><b5_0>not against political organization or "governance"<b5_0/>—so long as it is self-governance utilizing direct democracy.<a1_0/> The mode of political organization preferred by anarchists, in general, is <a2_0><b6_0><b7_0>federalism or confederalism<b7_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/>.[citation needed] However, the anarchist definition of federalism tends to differ from the definition of federalism assumed by pro-state political scientists.
